item.title: Leetcode 338: Counting Bits
item.author: Author
item.description: This question is interesting. I want to write down my solutions and help me review it in the future. The statement of the question is the following: Question statement Given a non negative integer number num. For every numbers i in the range 0 ≤ i ≤ num calculate the number of 1’s in their binary representation and return them as an array. Input: 2 Output: [0,1,1] Input: 5 Output: [0,1,1,2,1,2]
